page.title: 05Petch's pies,Great Ayton.
page.content: {Petch's Butchers}has been established in Great Ayton for over 100 years.The shop is set on the main{High Street oposite the{High Green.}The pies are their most popular product,although the shop does not just sell the pies but all kinds of meat,sausages and eggs.A lot of local people visit Petch's but many others travel just to buy the pies.Hundreds upon hundreds visit the shop each day.The shop belonged to Mr Petch's parents before him and is presently owned by Mr Donald Petch.Their cousins live on Petch's farm and used to supply the shop with eggs and Petch's dairy with potatoes .All of the produce has to live up to the very high standard which earned Petch's their very good name for so many years ago and which their customers still demand. by{Sarah Hopwood}&{Lee Thompson.}
